generalMsg:
Well, at least we have a functioning anti-missile system now. However, our soldiers are complaining that it is too slow, especially in calculating distances.
Apparently, our powerOf function is a bit outdated. It works, but surely there is a better way to do it, something about recursion... Why don't you take a look?
soldierMsg: Check out recursion in the manual. Careful with the base case! What happens when the exponent becomes 0?
